LanguageData.ShadowSquiddle.label: Shadow Squiddle
LanguageData.ShadowSquiddle.description: The Shadow Squiddle is a small black squiddle that lives in tropical swamps. They hunt fish and have a toxic bite. Like all Squiddles they are "milked" for their ink.
LanguageData.ShadowSquiddle.tools.head-0.label: head
LanguageData.ShadowSquiddle.tools.head-1.label: head
